original_text: On the seventh day of the fifth month, in the nineteenth year of Nebuchadnezzar king of Babylon, Nebuzaradan commander of the imperial guard, an official of the king of Babylon, came to Jerusalem.
korean_text: 바벨론 왕 느부갓네살의 열아홉째 해 오월 칠일에 바벨론 왕의 신복 시위대장 느부사라단이 예루살렘에 이르러

sentences.original_text: On the seventh day of the fifth month
in the nineteenth year of Nebuchadnezzar king of Babylon
Nebuzaradan commander of the imperial guard
an official of the king of Babylon
